'''Memory of the Entombed City''' is a [[Diagram]] obtained by opening the [[Chests|Precious Chest]] in the [[Mural Room]] (accessible after completing the [[Ancient Carvings]] puzzle). Once used, it allows the player to [[Forging|forge]] the 4-Star [[Claymore]] [[Snow-Tombed Starsilver]].
